name: SolarCity
description:
Use all the possibilities of the future to create a sustainable city in this management game that is based on real facts and correlations.

In SolarCity you have to manage the power, the water and the available space of a futuristic city to grow it to its maximum population. But keep in mind that nothing comes without a carbon footprint. 

The games average playtime ranged from 20 - 80 min.

This project was created over the course of three months as the subject of our Bachelor Thesis.

Created by: Anika Handtke & Markus Werner

Music by: Darius Sobolevski
